notes.title: Author contribution:
notes.p: All authors have reviewed and approved the manuscript. C.A.H. reviewed pathology data. R.P.K. reviewed cytogenetic data. A.T., K.H.B., A.A.K., W.J.H., M.R.L., N.G., and A.P. contributed to the recruitment of patients. D.B. and S.S. assisted in data extraction and analysis and preparation of figures. T.L.L. was in charge of mutation studies. A.T. and A.P. developed the study concept and design, contributed to recruitment of patients, assisted in data extraction, performed statistical analysis and wrote the paper.
